-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 3:00 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Murissa Sandwhisper (spoiler)

From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Thu, 17 Jun 1999, Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn wrote:
>
> I had the misfortune to get killed by Murissa Sandwhisper
the other day. I
> was not aware that she would attack someone unprovoked. I
was in North Ro

She was not unprovoked. :-)

Spoiler spacing for those who wish to try to figure out on
their own why Murissa kills them.

.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.

> I now know to avoid her. However, one day I will get my
revenge. Does
> anyone know if she is part of a quest? Also, when I do
get my revenge, is
> there a major faction hit with anyone in Freeport?

I'm pretty sure she is aligned with the cutthroat dervishes.
Yes, all those messages you ignored saying "Your faction
with
the Cutthroat Dervishes got worse" has a consequence. :-)

I'm still trying to figure out what the faction connection
is
with the merchant in the first building on the right as you
enter East Commonlands from Freeport. She stopped selling
to
me long before I ever met dervishes.


Kill her and find out <eg>

Sylly,
